description: Application for a non-material to planning permission ref: P2017/4939/S73.  The proposed amendments comprise: revisions to recessed bays on the west facade; revisions to ground floor doors and canopies; removal of north podium Building Maintenance Unit on the 4th and 7th floors; and amendments to 7th floor podium level plant enclosures.
decision_conditions:
This decision confirms the Council's agreement that following alternative wording of condition 2 of permission P2017/4939/S73 is acceptable:
CONDITION:  The development hereby approved shall be carried out in accordance with the following approved plans: HCL605-0500 Rev P2; HCL605-0501 P2; HCL605-1001 Rev.
